wikipedia_page.main: Kenneth Jackson (birth year unknown) is a former professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1940s, 1950s and 1960s. He played at representative level for Great Britain, and at club level for Oldham (Heritage № 554), as a prop, i.e. number 8 or 10, during the era of contested scrums.

response: *Ken Jackson (rugby league), rugby league footballer of the 1950s and 1960s for Great Britain, and Oldham
*Ken Jackson (baseball) (born 1963), former Major League Baseball player
